title: Trump posts racist meme of the Obamas — then deletes it
description: Trump's racist post came at the end of a minute-long video promoting conspiracy theories about the 2020 election.
content: Trump's racist post came at the end of a minute-long video promoting conspiracy theories about the 2020 election.
